sentences.en: Dusts can no longer be used instead of normal Imbue items in imbue recipes.
sentences.cn: 粉将不能在发光配方中再替代一般发光物品.

sentences.en: He managed to imbue his employees with team spirit.
sentences.cn: 他成功激发起雇员的团队精神.

sentences.en: He was able to imbue even the friendliest words with a tone of biting criticism.
sentences.cn: 即使是最友好的话他也能以冷嘲热讽的口吻说出来.

sentences.en: Imbue ArrowAllows Ranger to enhance his or her arrows with attacking or cursing spells.
sentences.cn: 注魔箭矢令游侠可以在箭矢上注入攻击或者诅咒性魔法.

sentences.en: Kass is trying to imbue physics into simulated worlds.
sentences.cn: 凯斯想要尝试的,就是把物理学引入模拟世界.

sentences.en: Music can delight my mood, and can also imbue me with confidence, or even more.
sentences.cn: 音乐能够使我心情愉快, 也能够使我充满信心, 甚至更多.

sentences.en: Ramparts create Fountains of Fortune to imbue its defenders with amazing luck.
sentences.cn: 壁垒城建造幸运泉,它为其防御者带来不可思议的好运.

sentences.en: The film is imbued with the star's rebellious spirit.
sentences.cn: 这部电影充满了那位明星的反叛精神。

sentences.en: You can imbue armor with magic you found.
sentences.cn: 你可以用魔法护甲灌输你发现.

trans.tran_en: If someone or something is imbued with an idea, feeling, or quality, they become filled with it
